ISSUE.TITLE: login error Not Found
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Gitness cannot log in again after running for a period of time, account lost ``` docker run -d --name gitness --restart always \ -e GITNESS_PRINCIPAL_ADMIN_PASSWORD=gitness \ -e GITNESS_USER_SIGNUP_ENABLED=false \ -p 3000:3000 \ -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \ -v /data/gitness:/data \ harness/gitness ```
